I am happy to post an update to currently available standard mini plans :-)

We are very keen to receive community feedback on specs for default plans, and we welcome individual setup requests! The plans below are an excerpt of available low end plans, and we have created discount codes applicable to those plans for those who want to go for quarterly payments at least (one code per order, expires Sep 6, 2012): 

Quarterly, 10% off: LET10MQ
Semi-Annually, 20% off: LET20MS
Annually, 30% off: LET30MA

Anyone interested in any non-LET plan, please quote either of the discount codes, and we will apply half the discount to any other VPS order placed for the respective billing period (so any other VPS plan paid quarterly will receive 5% off, semi annually paid VPS will receive 10% off, and annual payments will receive 15% discount). To qualify for that, you must be a LET member (casual check done, no true DD enforcing ;) 


cheers -
oz.
